If you're looking for a game to get spooked and get a thrill out of, this is your game. Nothing beats getting chased by the killer and your adrenaline going up the roof. The game's main core is so simple. Finish the generators and get out through the exit before you die. But the game is advanced and brilliantly made with the perk system which allows both the killer and survivors to modify or gain new abilities or enhancements. It's especially fun to play with your friends but it's looked down upon by the killer player community. It seems as a disadvantage for them but nonetheless games are always fun playing with friends. The only downside I can give is that some of the perks are a little too overpowered but balancing is always a tricky concept in all games. The thing I hate most is the connection to host who can be all the way on the other side of the world from you. Thank God they are implementing dedicated servers in summer of 2019.

Раньше я считал эту игру полным дерьмом,но все равно продолжал в нее играть.Почему?Потому что у нее нет нормальных аналогов и она не лишена плюсов:
1. Разнообразие выживших и маньяков,а также персонажи из фильмов и сериалов.
2. Несмотря на однообразие играть интересно.
3. Новые главы,улучшения графики,музыка,истории персонажей и маньяков,анимационные ролики.
4. Различные ивенты.
[b]Также имеются минусы[/b]:
1. Несмотря на улучшения графики,все равно выглядит мыльно и умудряется лагать.
2. Все новые маньяки платные,а некоторые(из фильмов)нельзя купить за осколки.
3. Нету новых режимов.
4. Нету нормальных рангов,которые захочется поднимать.
5. Плохая система подбора.
6. Баги.
7. [u]Только для карт,которые являются одним зданием[/u]:террор убийцы-невозможно ориентировать по нему.Маньяк на первом этаже,а ты на втором и ты слышишь его террор и не можешь понять на каком он этаже.
[b]Итог[/b]:несмотря на то,что минусов больше игра хорошая и я рекомендую ее купить.

This game is a blast at first. But it gets old pretty fast when you get to the ranks where everyone knows what they are doing. It becomes a game about maximizing seconds and any mistake you make puts you further and further behind. Not to mention the chore that is acquiring blood points to get addons needed to hope to stand a chance. If you main killer I hope you are emotionally stable because your patience will be tested. If you saw a popular youtuber play this game and thought to yourself that it looks fun and you want to try it, i assure you that will wear off and it will be one of the most frustrating multiplayer games in your library. It is overall a horrible experience past the first 6 hours.

+Геймплей играется свежо , не в каждой игре тебе дадут почувствовать себя в роли маньяка .



+Кооператив , все любят кооператив .




+Атмосфера, с самого начала тебе и правда страшно , ищешь подвох в любой кочке .



+Музыка: Действует на атмосферу сугубо положительно , нагнетает там где и когда надо .



Минусы



-Отсутствие ранговой системы , при присутствие прокачки . В начале игры прокаченый на максимум маньяк будет *бать вас и в хвост , и в гриву .



-Сюжет , его тут нет. Есть записки , но серьёзно , мы не знаем ничего о мире.



-Отсутствие микрофона , из-за которого невозможно играть слаженно .

Hmm where do i start? when i first bought the game i thought it was sh!t and a waste of money, but the more i played the more i started to like it, Good mechanics, cool killers and survivors, good store where you can see all the things you can get EVEN PERKS! (a little too expensive in my view XD) overall a great game. even though it could be better if they made survivors more interesting to play with a better way to fight back. what i love most about this game is the community! unlike other games erhm erhm with another famous killer, The community is mostly friendly whether they loose or win it really makes you feel good playing it. Ofc it doesn't mean it's free of toxic or annoying people but you can always get them to disconnect once they realize they're fu#$ed. Futhermore, You can choose any killer or survivor get perks from any of them and the dlcs definitely worth buying! they are fun. I definitely recommend this game. and like always be safe online!

Einfach ein nices Spiel, an dem immer gearbeitet wird. Als Einzelgänger oder mit Freunden, sowie oberflächlich als auch intensiv gespielt ein großer Spaß. Die Hälfte meiner Freunde haben das Spiel auf meine Empfehlung gekauft und eigentlich hat es allen gefallen, besonders nach den ersten paar Gewöhnungsstunden.

The Game has recently improved and Camping has become less frequent.

This is a good game. The balancing isn't perfect, and likely will never be. Worst parts about this game are killers who decide to have fun by ruining your fun (which means tunnelers and the existence of legion, basically). 
Takes FOREVER to farm for the perk build that you want, so be prepared to not have a chance to play how you want for the first 200+ hours of this game. Throwing money at the game helps very little, you just need to play...and play...and play. 
Really dislike the amount of grinding and farming needed to get new perks, but is a solid game at its core. 
Would much prefer being able to pick up the game fresh and have the same tools that someone with 2000+ hours have, but that simply isn't the case here. 

Solid game, don't play legion, good luck with the grind if you get this.
very good game gg

Devs are incompetent. Very poor game balance, while also grindy as hell. Badly designed killers and events have been the most recent updates. The game has both a ton of DLCs and microtransactions for skins. Awfully designed events will be introduced to the game to try to push limited time skins on you.

It also currently has no dedicated servers, which makes matchmaking a nightmare. Join a lobby, ping too high, leave lobby. Have to remake your party all over again every time. Then when you finally get a good lobby, too frequently the game crashes or someone disconnects during load. Also enables the killer to cheat with things like lag switches because they are the host. I'll rewrite this review if/when they finally give this game the dedicated servers depending on how good the implementation is. Given BHVR's track record I don't have a lot of hope.

Can't in good conscience recommend. I feel bad for the friends I've gotten into this mess of a game.

Update: The game has dedicated servers now and matchmaking has been slightly improved. Getting into a match still takes way too long, however. And laggy killers are still a problem.

dead by daylight 

Pontos positivos:
-dificuldade em liberar vantagens assim rendendo mais tempo de jogo
-bastante assassinos e sobrevivente para upar
-jogo muito bonito 
-otimização mediana
-da alguns susto(raramente pra mim)
-jogar com amigo é bem divertido 
-jogar muito para aprender a mecanica do jogo
-da pra comprar personagens de dlc jogando
-adição de eventos que muda um pouco a jogabilidade

Pontos negativos:
-maioria dos personagens OPs são pagos
-perks super OPs para assassinos mesmo tendo vantagem no sobrevivente
-Facecamp muito chato
-toxicos dms
-lag atrapalha dms em quase tudo
-diversos bugs que existe desde o lançamento n resolvidos
-lagswitch 
-Legion
-Huntress hitbox gigante
-falta de perks bom para sobreviventes
-roupas pagas
-roupas baratas feias pra cacete

Por fim é um jogo bem equilibrado e rende uma gameplay grande se vc tentar fazer tds as conquistas e upar personagens. Precisava adicionar mais eventos que mudasse bastante a gameplay assim ficando mais divertido

nota: 9.3/10
Recomendo o jogo, amo mt, super divertido ele, mas ainda precisa resolver alguns problemas, como hitbox, etc, mas claro q dá pra jogar, super recomendo.
A very fun game that you can get attached to so fast. The creators produce and give us frequent content every couple months.

我是个技术很菜很菜的萌新 但 我真的很喜欢这款游戏 即使因为工作关系很少有时间去玩它 每当游戏跟新出新的DLC时 我都会关注并第一时间购买它们 只是想支持一下 因为我喜欢这款游戏
我不玩屠夫 因为觉得很憋屈 当我看到有人拔线的时候 每一次看到都会觉得很憋气 可怜的屠夫玩家们
我只玩人类 因为有伙伴的感觉真的很不错 尤其是这款让你胆颤心惊的游戏 每一次被追杀 每一次被砍倒 每一次上钩子时 我的队友都会想办法来解救我 或者送我一程……哈哈
或者仅剩我和另一个伙伴时 我上钩子了 也会放弃挣扎 因为有地道 但你跟屠夫在地道口互相凝望然后打招呼的时候我就忍不了了……混蛋 我多挣扎一会儿就好了……让屠夫砍死你 哼哼
每次玩的时候仍然胆颤心惊 那种感觉……真香……
感谢每一个让我感受到乐趣的玩家们 不论你是人类玩家还是屠夫玩家 伙计们 谢谢你们

非対称性のゲームとしてホラー要素を取りいれつつ追いかけっこをするゲーム。
良い点として追いかけっこの読みあいは非常に楽しい。
またホラー映画のキャラクターや舞台を取り入れたりと他の非対称性ゲームと比べてユニークといえる。

キャラクターのパーク構成を考え、それを対策する思考ゲームだが

悪い点としてバグやマッチングシステムが致命的である。

非常にバグが多い中運営も対処に追われているだろうがあまりにも遅かったり、
バグ要素を残したままアップデートしたりと
運営状況が悪い。
マッチングシステムにおいてはキラーとサバイバーの偏りが激しい。
2/5現在行われているイベントではキラーがイベントのポイント取得することがサバイバーよりも難しいため、その偏りが激化している。
お金を払ってストレスを貯めながらボランティアをするゲームでした。バグに次ぐバグに次ぐバグに次ぐバグで何が仕様で何がバグかもうわかりません。友達とやったら楽しいと思います。友達とやって楽しくないゲームを私は知りませんが。

Bon bon bon, le jeu en sois est bien même si très beaucoup répétitif. Beaucoup trop de points négatif on croirait presque que c'est une bêta tellement le jeu bug par moment (chargement qui bug ce qui vous oblige a fermer votre jeu avec le gestionnaire de tâche, etc...) voir même très souvent enfaite . Autre point négatif le matchmaking on tombe avec des joueur qui ont une connexion littéralement a chier (en pesant mes mots) or la latence dû au matchmaking gène le gameplay voir rend même le jeu instable (il arrive même d'attentre 30 minutes voir plus pour une pauvre partie, le jeu est sorti en 2016 et il n'y a toujours pas de serveurs dédié, certe ils ont été annoncé courant année 2019 mais bon cela n'empêche pas que le jeu est part moment injouable. Ne parlons même pas de la toxicité de la communauté.
Bref tout ça pour vous dire que je ne recommande surtout pas ce jeu actuellement il y a encore beaucoup trop de travail pour que le jeu soit potable.

After a lot of playtime I can say that this game is fun. It’s a lot of fun with friends, even though the mechanics and such are really confusing, it’s still fun. The game is really annoying to play, because of the way most people play it. It’s still worth a shot though.

I’d give it a 7/10, buy it if it’s on sale.

Несмотря на то, что многие называют игру нестабильной, мне она нравится
Плюсы:
1. Адреналин. После нескольких каток сон снимает как рукой
2. Командная игра (за выживших). Всегда весело проводить игры с кем-то из друзей
3. Разнообразность навыков персонажей, разнообразие карт и убийц
Минусы:
1. Часто, с каждым новым патчем появляются новые проблемы
2. Порой сервера не вывозят и вся игра основывается на лагах
3. Были моменты, когда игра просто вылетала. Лечилось через настройки 
4. Донат. Без него невозможно накопить сумму на покупку всех персонажей в игре

Just a quick note to all people who start reading this review:

I am not a developer of the game and im not sponsored. The game is known as dbd is played worldwide on pc, playstation and nintendo but little did they know they made one major mistake.

Exhibit A:
The Camper Legacy
From the start of the game there was at least one person to get the idea of staying close to the hooked survivor so no one can save him. But why did they called it camping? A century ago, popularization of the automobile, improving roads and America's passion for exploration gave rise to mass-produced, manufactured recreation vehicles, and the RV industry was born.

In 1910, there were few gas stations, few paved roads and no highway system. But there were RVs. 1910 is the year that America’s leading RV historians – David Woodworth, Al Hesselbart and Roger White – cite as the beginning of what has become the modern RV industry.

1910

“The first motorized campers were built in 1910,” says Woodworth, a preeminent collector of early RVs and RV camping memorabilia. “Before then, people camped in private rail cars that were pulled to sidings along train routes. The year 1910 brought a new freedom to people who didn’t want to be limited by the rail system. RVs allowed them to go where they wanted, when they wanted.”

Hesselbart, archivist for the RV/MH Heritage Museum in Elkhart, Indiana, also pinpoints 1910 as the birth of the RV industry. “Camping has been around for centuries, but 1910 is when the first auto-related camping vehicles were built for commercial sale.” Known as “auto campers” or “camping trailers” a century ago, these vehicles were a forerunner of today’s modern RVs.

“There were one-offs [individual units] built prior to 1910,” says White, an associate curator for the Smithsonian Institution. “But 1910 is a good benchmark for the industry.”

Exhibit B:
The Tunnel

March 25, 1843, the first tunnel constructed under a river was opened to the (paying) public. After eighteen years of work, the 1,300 feet long Thames Tunnel was finally finished.

At the time it was considered impossible to build under a river. In fact, in 1828 a water leakage into the tunnel caused the drowning of six workers. Work at the tunnel was stopped until two engineers came up with an ingenious solution. Marc Isambard Brunel and Thomas Cochrane got inspiration from a mollusk, revolutionizing tunneling thereafter. Teredo navalis, the naval shipworm, is a species of saltwater clam, a marine bivalve mollusk, with a strongly reduced shell. At the front end of the reddish, wormlike body of the animal there are two triangular, calcareous plates, used by the animal to rasp burrows into wood. Supposedly one day Brunel and Cochrane observed one of the burrows in a plank of a wooden ship, anchored in the harbor of London. The animal uses a secretion to cover the inner walls of its burrow with a thin layer of limestone, leaving only the front free, where it continues to dig, using the hard plates. Brunel and Cochrane used a similar method to finish the Thames Tunnel.  Miners would dig at the front of the tunnel, protected by a movable wooden framework. Immediately behind the miners, workers would secure the tunnel, covering the walls with bricks and concrete.

Exhibit C:

I mean if this game was free then I can't complain too much, but it is NOT! So if you looking for some casual game find something else... This game is not worth your money!

업데이트가 맞습니까? 제가볼때에는 다운데이트가 맞는것같은데요?
도대체 유저 피드백을 하신 것은 맞나요? 한 번이라도 해본 사람이라면 알겠지만 이걸 한번이라도 플레이를 해 본 사람이면 이번 업데이트가 얼마나 망했는지 금방 알수 있었을텐데 저로서는 잘 이해가 가지 않네요.
그리고 옛날에도 그랬지만 요새 게임 잡으려면 최소 5분 이상은 걸리는 것 같아요. 그래서 저는 이 게임 매칭 돌려놓고 피망 포커를 같이 하고있어요. 어떻게하면 이렇게 매치가 느리죠? 무슨 슈퍼컴퓨터라도 써서 하나하나 행동분석을 해서 거기에 맞게 매칭을 하나요? 그런것도 아닌데 서버에 사람 없는거면 다른 서버로 자동으로 이동해서 매치가 되게 해야죠.
그리고 또 게임 잡히면 매크로가 태반이고, 다른 유저들도 실력차이가 들쭉날쭉이라서 플레이하기가 힘드네요.
물론 매크로가 있으면 블포 먹기 쉽기는 한데, 게임이라는게 단지 점수만 내려고 하는 게 아니잖아요?
맵도 리메이크된다고 해서 플레이해봤는데 이상하고너무 밝아졌어요. 발전기 남은갯수하고 스킬체크 성공에 따른 점수 얻는거는 또 이상한데에다가 두고 글씨도 더 작아져서 전반적으로 분산된 느낌이라서 한눈에 보기가 어렵네요.
그리고 이것저것 화려한 이펙트 넣으면 생존자는 오히려 집중이 안돼요.
그냥 기존대로 캐릭터나 코스튬 이쁜거로 늘려서  DLC 장사나 하는 게 더 도움이 된다고 생각해요.
아니면 퍽이나 애드온 바꿔서 밸런스를 조금 더 잘 맞추던지
어차피 한글로 쓰니까 이걸 개발자들이 읽는것은 기대도 하지 않지만 이 게임 새로 사려고 하는 사람들은 그돈으로 집에서 그냥 피자나 치킨 사드시는게 더 이득입니다.
아무튼 롤백되기 전까지 이 게임에 좋은소리는 못하겠네요. 그럼 안녕.​
классный новый убийца
